compensation.notes: Need to visit property to register, call prior to visit.

rating.title: Sorry to leave
rating.description: I was so sorry to have to leave Maple Trail and Allen. I truly feel as though I left family behind. I was very stressed when looking for a place to live, a first time single mom of 2, I'm so glad I was led to Maple Trail. Not only

rating.title: More than satisfied-over 3 years
rating.description: I have lived at Maple Trail for over 3 years and have never had a more pleasant experience with an apartment complex. Unfortunately, I have taken a job that is just too far away to commute daily. I signed on to this website to research apartments near my office. After

rating.title: Great Place to Live
rating.description: I live at Maple Trail's with my family and we love it. We have been here a year and have just resigned our lease for another year. The apartment staff is very friendly and helpful, matinance is always quick to respond to calls. The neighbors are friendly. This is a

rating.title: I love my apartment community
rating.description:
I love living here at maple trail apartments. The office staff is always friendly and helpful. The maintenance staff is quick and knowledgable. I have lived here for 3 years and I have not had any problem that wasn't taken care of quickly and efficently.
I also find the area

rating.title: LOVE IT!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
rating.description: I have been here for almost a year now and this is by far the best property that I have ever lived at. They have free exercise classes. I have already done water aerobics, Yoga and pilates. Everyone is friendly! I thought it was nice to see the management to be

rating.title: So happy...TO LEAVE
rating.description: I couldn't wait to leave here. These apartments, for as new as they are, are run horribly by the most inconsiderate staff. They will be trash in a few short years. Do not rent here if you can afford to look somewhere else, I advise you, go, quickly. (Auberry is

rating.title: Hypocracy at the Trail
rating.description: Pretty sad when residents are faced with a $100 fine for not cleaning up after their pets, but the assistant manager's mom can walk her little dog and let it go all over the place and not pick it up.

rating.title: Sad to have to leave......
rating.description: I have lived here for approximately 1 1/2yrs. Through no choice of my own, I must leave due to a job transfer to Phoenix, AZ. First off, upon looking at the apartments, being that it is next to Allen High School, I thought, what FUN this is gonna be. It actually

rating.title: Weekend Office Help
rating.description: I called last week and spoke with a lady about a two bedroom apartment. I was told about two that will coming up they were being worked on .I came by the office Saturday and spoke to one of the rudest and uncaring people I have ever came across working

rating.title: Weekend Leasing Person
rating.description: To Whom This May Concern, Please replace your weekend help. We came out looking for a two bedroom and had called during the week and spoke to a very nice lady over the phone. My husband was told that you had some and would be able to look at one .But

rating.title: Can't wait to move.
rating.description: Noisy dishwasher and heating and cooling unit. Have to turn up the tv to hear it, or go into the bedroom and shut the door to talk on the phone. There is only a fraction of the parking spaces needed for the number of apartments, even with covered parking that
terrible place management cannot make up their minds, also gone through so many owners terrible it is all a trick to get you in!

I LOVE IT HERE!!!! I have been here for 3 years I love this place. I cannot say enough good things about the kind, friendly management. They have outstanding response. They are SUPER!!! The property is a safe secure beautiful property!!! The upkeep by the maintenance is wonderful and always with

My grandma stays here and it is a nice complex but you can never find a place to park. I promise I've walked from one side of the complex to the other cause there was no place to park. It is sad. My grandma had to fight for a handicap

rating.title: Not a pleasant experience
rating.description: My boyfriend and I lived at this complex (with a roommate) for two years and would not recommend this complex unless it is under new management. Parking was a nightmare - even after paying for a reserved spot others often parked in my space, especially late at night. I could
Some of your neighbors are playing there music to loud and it desterbs my son when he is sleeping but everything else is okay you all have a lovely pool area and good parking most of the time.

rating.title: Happy so far
rating.description: Granted I have only been here 3 weeks but so far I love it. My apt. appears to be built well and was very clean when I moved in. The office staff is a joy to deal with. They are very pleasant and the manager Rhonda will bend over backwards

rating.title: Not bad at all
rating.description: My expieriance living here was nice, allthough the walls seem then, I could here the woman under me walk around. Management is very helpfull and they are very quick in getting things done. I just mentioned that a bulb in the chandelier was out and she insisted that one of

rating.title: overall good, but watch some things
rating.description: parking is terrible. You have to pay extra for a covered spot. Otherwise you use unassigned parking and there is not near enough. Parking on street very common, but so are busted windows and break ins. Management is pretty good and I enjoy living there.

rating.title: Average all around
rating.description: It was one of the few places with a reasonable price on a 3 month lease. We used it as a temporary place to live whie our house was being built. Its close proximity to the high school allowed us to enjoy early morning band practice, track and field events,
